songs.name: Doobey(Gehraiyaan (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack))
songs.lyrics:
...
Tera-mera, donon ka dil besabar
Besabar,besabar
Shaam-o-sahar donon ka dil bekhabar (haan )
Bekhabar, bekhabar
Lo kashtiyaan hamaari yoon takaraa gayi
Lahar-lahar donon ka dil besafar
Besafar, besafar
Haan , duube, haan , duube, haan , duube ek-duje mein yahaan
Haan , duube, haan , duube, haan , duube, uf, ye gaharaaiyaan
Haan , duube, haan , duube, haan , duube ek-duje mein yahaan
Hai saanson mein samandar, hai dil mein dhuaan
Dheere-dheere aise giren bijliyaan
Too bhee, main bhee beasar
Bheege-bheege dekho ruhen is qadar
Beasar, beasar
Lo apanae kinaare yoon takaraa gae
Lahar-lahar donon ka dil besafar
Uf, ye gaharaaiyaan
Haan , duube, haan , duube, haan , duube ek-duje mein yahaan

Rah jaaegaa kya, mmm, jo baha gae yahaan?
Chal baha jaaen yahaan
Ho jaaegaa kya jo kho gae yahaan?
Chal kho jaaen yahaan
Haan , duube, haan , duube, haan , duube ek-duje mein yahaan

songs.name: Raataan Lambiyan(Shershaah (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack))
songs.singer: Tanishk Bagchi, Jubin Nautiyal & Asees Kaur
songs.lyrics:
...
Teri-meri gallan ho gayi mashoor
Kar na kabhi tu mujhe nazron se duur
Kithe chaliye? Tu kithe chaliye?
Tu kithe chaliye? (kithe chaliye?)
Jaan'da ae dil, yeh to jaandi ae tu
Tere bina main na rahun, mere bina tu
Kithe chaliye? Tu kithe chaliye?
Tu kithe chaliye? (kithe chaliye?)
Kaatun kaise raataan, oh saanwre?
Jiya nahi jaata, sun baawre
Ke raataan lambiyan lambiyan re
Kate tere sangeya, sangeya re
Ke raataan lambiyan lambiyan re
Kate tere sangeya, sangeya re
...
Cham-cham-cham ambran de taare kehnde ne, sajna
Tu hi chann mere is dil da, mann le ve, sajna
Tere bina mera hove na guzara
Chadd ke na jaavi mainu, tu hi hai sahara
Kaatun kaise raataan, oh saanwre?
Jiya nahi jaata, sun baawre
Ke raataan lambiyan lambiyan re
Kate tere sangeya, sangeya re
Ke raataan lambiyan lambiyan re
Kate tere sangeya, sangeya re
...
Teri-meri gallan ho gayi mashoor
Kar na kabhi tu mujhe nazron se duur
Picche chaliye, tere picche chaliye, tere picche chaliye
Jaan'da ae dil, yeh to jaandi ae tu
Tere bina main na rahun, mere bina tu
Kithe chaliye? Tu kithe chaliye?
Tu kithe chaliye? (kithe chaliye?)
Kaatun kaise raataan, oh saanwre?
Jiya nahi jaata, sun baawre
Ke raataan lambiyan lambiyan re
Kate tere sangeya, sangeya re
Ke raataan lambiyan lambiyan re
Kate tere sangeya, sangeya re
...
Ke raataan lambiyan lambiyan re
Kate tere sangeya, sangeya re
Ke raataan lambiyan lambiyan re
Kate tere sangeya, sangeya re

songs.name: Dil Ko Karaar Aaya (Sukoon)
songs.singer: Yasser Desai, Neha Kakkar, Rajat Nagpal
songs.lyrics:
...
Dua bhi lage na mujhey dawa bhi lage na mujhey
Jabse dil ko mere thu laga hai
Neend raaton ki meri chahat baaton ki meri
Chain ko bhi mere tune yu thaga hai
Jab saansey bharu mai
Band aankhey kru mai
Najar tu yaar aaya
Dil ko karaar aaya tujhpe hai pyaar aaya
Pehli pehli baar aaya oh yaara
Dil ko karaar aaya tujh pe pyaar aaya
Pehli pehli baar aaya oh yaara
...
Har roj puchey ye hawaye hum tho batha ke haarey
Kyun jikir tera karthe hey humse taaare
Dua bhi lge na mujhey dwa bhi lge na mujhey
Kyun jikir tera karthe hey humse taaare
Ab kaisey hai tere
In hoton pe mere izhaar hara yaara yaara
Dil ko karaar aaya tujh pe pyaar aaya
Pehli pehli baar aaya oh yaara
Dil ko karaar aaya tujh pe pyaar aaya
Pehli pehli baar aaya o yaara

songs.name: Srivalli(Pushpa The Rise Part - 01)
songs.lyrics:
...
Nazrein milte hi nazron se nazron ko churaye
Kaisi ye haya teri, jo tu palkon ko jhukaye?
Rab jo poshida hai, usko nihare tu
Aur jo garvida hai, usko taale tu
Teri jhalak asharfi, Srivalli, naina madak-barfi
Teri jhalak asharfi, Srivalli, baatein kare do-harfi
...
Hmm, saara zamana hai mere peeche
Par ye deewana hai tere peeche
Sar ye jhukne na doon duniya ke aage
Par teri paayal dekhoon kar ke sar neeche
Na tamanna heera-panna, mujhko hai bas tera banna
Ek jhalak teri aankhon mein khwaab saja jaaye
Teri jhalak asharfi, Srivalli, naina madak-barfi
Teri jhalak asharfi, Srivalli, baatein kare do-harfi
Lai-lai-lai-laga, lai-lai-lai-laga
Lai-lai-lai-laga, lai-lai-lai
Lai-lai-lai-laga, lai-lai-lai-laga
Lai-lai-lai-laga, lai-lai-lai
Lai-lai-lai-laga, lai-lai-lai-laga
Lai-lai-lai-laga, lai-lai-lai
...
Teri saheliyan saada-maamooli
Uske muqaabale thodi tu bhali
Jaise hi solvaah chadh jaaye saavan
Tu kya, har ladki dikhe phoolon ki kali
Baans pe lipti laal saari, woh bhi dikhi rajkumaari
Jhumke, bindi aur gajre se roop nikhar jaaye, phir bhi
Teri jhalak asharfi, Srivalli, naina madak-barfi
Teri jhalak asharfi, Srivalli, baatein kare do-harfi
Lai-lai-lai-laga, lai-lai-lai-laga
Lai-lai-lai-laga, lai-lai-lai
Lai-lai-lai-laga, lai-lai-lai-laga
Lai-lai-lai-laga, lai-lai-lai

songs.name: Dil Diyan Gallan(Tiger Zinda Hai)
songs.lyrics:
...
Kachchi doriyon, doriyon, doriyon se
Mainu tu baandh le
Pakki yaariyon, yaariyon, yaariyon mein
Aunde na faasley
Eh naraazgi kaagzi saari teri
Mere sohneya, sun le meri
Dil diyan gallan
Karaange naal naal beh ke
Ankh naal ankh nu mila ke
Dil diyan gallan haaye… 
Karaange roz roz beh ke
Sachiyan mohabbatan nibha ke
Sataaye mainu kyun, dikhaaye mainu kyun
Aivein jhooti mooti russ ke rusaake
Dil diyan gallan, haaye
Karaange naal naal beh ke
Ankh naal ankh nu mila ke
...
Tenu lakhan ton chhupa ke rakhan, akkhan te saja ke
Tu hai meri wafa, rakh apna bana ke
Main teri laiyan, teri laiyan yaara
Na paavin kade dooriyan, haaye
Tenu lakhan ton chhupa ke rakhan, akkhan te saja ke
Tu hai meri wafa, rakh apna bana ke
Main teri laiyan, teri laiyan yaara
Na paavin kade dooriyan
Main jeena haan tera aa…
Main jeena haan tera, tu jeena hai mera
Dass lena ki nakhra dikha ke
Dil diyan gallan
Karaange naal naal beh ke
Ankh naal ankh nu mila ke
Dil diyan gallan
Raatan kaaliyan, kaaliyan, kaaliyan ne
Mere din saanwale
Mere haaniyan, haaniyan, haaniyan je
Lagge tu na gale
Mera aasman mausaman di na sune
Koi khwaab na poora bane..
Dil diyan gallan
Karaange naal naal beh ke
Ankh naal ankh nu mila ke
Pata hai mainu kyun chupa ke dekhe tu
Mere naam se naam mila ke
Dil diyan gallan
Karaange naal naal beh ke
Ankh naal ankh nu mila ke
Dil diyan gallan....

songs.name: Rait Zara Si(Atrangi Re)
songs.singer: A. R. Rahman, Arijit Singh & Shashaa Tirupati
songs.lyrics:
...
Hona, tera hona
Paana, tumko paana
Jeena hai yeh manaa
Pal bhar mein sadiyan
Hai sadiyon mein...
Jeena hai yeh manaa
Haath mein teri khushboo hai, khushboo se dil behla hai
Yeh haathon se yun phisla hai, ho jaise rait zara si
Roz mohabbat padta hai, dil yeh tumse judta hai
Hawaaon mein yun udta hai, ho jaise rait zara si
Vaasam, adhu vaasam veesuthadi
Vaasam, adhu vaasam veesuthadi
...
Yeh hulchal dil ki yeh hulchal
Bole aaj aas paas tu mere
Bikhra hoon main toh, kuch pal hawa mein 
Tere bharose ko thaame
Chalna bhi hai, badalna bhi hai
Tujhmein hi toh dhalna bhi hai...
Dil thoda jazbaati hai, bhar jaata hai baaton se
Yeh phir chhalke yun aankhon se, ho jaise rait zara si...
Haath mein teri khushboo hai, sach poochho toh ab yun hai
Tu chehre pe mere thehra, ho jaise rait zara si
Vaasam, adhu vaasam veesuthadi
Vaasam, adhu vaasam veesuthadi
Na-na-na-na
Oh, na-na-na
Vaasam veesuthadi
Oh, na-na-na
(Vaasam veesuthadi)
(Vaasam veesuthadi)

songs.name: Dil Galti Kar Baitha Hai
songs.lyrics:
...
Ye humne soch rakha tha, mohabbat na karenge hum
Kisi ko dil nahi denge, kisi pe na marenge hum
Ye humne soch rakha tha, mohabbat na karenge hum
Kisi ko dil nahi denge, kisi pe na marenge hum
Tumhari mast aankhon ne, yeh kaisa haal kar daala
Ke yeh dil cheez kya hai, maang lo toh jaan denge hum
Palat ke ishq ki galiyon se, jaana hai bada mushkil
Dil galti kar baitha hai, galti kar baitha hai dil
Dil galti kar baitha hai, galti kar baitha hai dil
Dil galti kar baitha, ab bol hamara kya hoga?
Bol hamara, hamara, bol hamara, hamara...
(Bol hamara) o, yaara, bol hamara kya hoga?
...
Khamoshiyan sunte kab tak rahenge hum?
Mauka hai, hothon se aaj kuch toh kaho
Badi mukhtsar si hai yeh zindagi, yaara
Zara paas aa jao sochte na raho
Tum apna lo ya thukra do, tumhein haq faisle ka hai
Humein kya poochte ho tum? Hamare haath mein kya hai?
Ke hum to kar chuke, jaana, tumhein har saans mein shaamil
Dil galti kar baitha hai, galti kar baitha hai dil
Dil galti kar baitha hai, galti kar baitha hai dil
Dil galti kar baitha, ab bol hamara kya hoga?
Bol hamara, hamara, bol hamara, hamara...
(Bol hamara) oh, yaara, bol hamara kya hoga?
Dil galti kar baitha hai, galti kar baitha hai dil...
...
Aaha! Aaha!
Ke pehle-pehle ho gayi (humse deedaar ki galti)
Dobara kar gaye hum (be-irada pyar ki galti)
Humein zid thi, tumhare ishq mein hum qatl ho jaayein
To tum pe mar mita yeh dil (aakhiri baar ki galti)
Kahan aashiq koyi hum sa, kahan tum sa koyi qaatil
Dil galti kar baitha hai, galti kar baitha hai dil
Dil galti kar baitha hai, galti kar baitha hai dil
Dil galti kar baitha, ab bol hamara kya hoga?
Bol hamara (aaha), hamara, bol hamara (aaha), hamara...
Bol hamara (aaha), o, yaara, bol hamara kya hoga?
Dil galti kar baitha hai (galti kar baitha hai dil)
Dil galti kar baitha hai (galti kar baitha hai dil...)
Dil galti kar baitha, haay

songs.name: Nazm Nazm(Bareilly Ki Barfi)
songs.lyrics:
...
na naa... na naa...
tu nazm-nazm sa mere
hontho pe thehar ja
main khwab-khwab sa teri
aankhon main jaagun re
tu ishq-ishq sa mere
rooh main aa ke bas ja
jis ore teri shehanai
us ore main bhagu re
...
na naa... na naa...
haath tham le piya
karte hai vaada
ab se tu arzoo
tu hi he iraadaa
meraa naam le piya
main teri rubaai
tere hi to peeche-peeche
barsaat ai
barsaat ai
tu ittar-ittar sa mere
sanson main bikhar ja
main fakir tere kurbat kaa
tujhse tu maanguun re
tu ishq-ishq sa mere
rooh main aa ke bas ja
jis ore teri shehanai
us ore main bhagu re
...
mere dil ke lifafe main
tera khat he jaania
tera khat he jaania
naacheez ne kaise paa lee
qismat ye jaania ve
ho mere dil ke lifafe main
tera khat he jaania
tera khat he jaania
naacheez ne kaise paa lee
jannat ye jaania ve
tu nazm-nazm sa mere
hontho pe thehar ja
tu nazm-nazm sa mere
hontho pe thehar ja
main khwab-khwab sa teri
aankhon main jaagun re
tu ishq-ishq sa mere
rooh main aa ke bas ja
jis ore teri shehanai
us ore main bhaagun re
na naa... na naa...

songs.name: Kabhii Tumhhe (Female Version)(Shershaah (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack))
songs.lyrics:
...
Mere-tumhare khwaab woh saari
Dekhe thhe jo, sach honge yahi
"Honge juda na," tumne kaha tha
Aayega pal ye socha nahi
Ye bhi kaha tha tumne mujhe
"Main duur na jaaunga"
Dil ko mere na samajh aaya
Tera bin bole chale jaana
Kabhi tumhe yaad meri aaye
Raah se meri guzar jaana
...
Tu agar manaoge to maan jaaungi
Main tere bulane pe laut aaungi
Har safar mein saath tera main yun hi nibhaungi
Kabhi tumhein yaad meri aaye
Palkon ko apni utha lena
Saaf dikhungi main tumko wahin
Jo na dikhun to bata dena
Kabhi mujhe der jo ho jaaye
Waqt ko thoda bacha lena
Phir se milungi main tumko wahin
Jo na milun to saza dena

...
Man ye sahib ji
Jaane hai sab ji
Phir bhi banaaye bahaane
Naina nawabi ji
Dekhen hai sab ji
Phir bhi na samjhe ishaare
Man ye sahib ji

Naina nawabi ji
Na samjhe ishaare
Dheere-dheere

Jiya ko dheere-dheere
Bhaayo re saibo
Dheere-dheere
Begaana dheere-dheere
Apna sa dheere-dheere
Laage re saibo
...
Surkhiyan hai hawaon main
Do dilon ke milne ki
Arziyan hai nazaron mein
Lamha ye tham jaane ki
Kaise huzur ji
Ye lab dikhlaaye
Chuppi laga ke bhi gazab hai ye dhaaye

songs.name: Ve Maahi(Kesari)
songs.lyrics:
...
Carnival!
The last ride!
King!
Tu aake dekh le, ho, maine raatein kitni saari
Teri yaadon mein guzaari, sohniye sohniye...
Tu aake dekh le, ho, maine raatein kitni saari
Teri yaadon mein guzaari, sohniye sohniye...
Log kehte bechara, zara pucho to kyun hara
Jab pyar mila nahi to dil ka, qatal kar naam bana daala
Yeh jhoomta aawara, kaise jeeta chala jara
Bekhauf nigaah meri, jhaank ke dekho to taj bana aa raha
Par tere aage kuch bhi nahi, sab khaakh baraabar
Main kho jaunga, mil ke mujh se baat kara kar
Par tere aage kuch bhi nahi, sab khaakh baraabar 
Main kho jaunga, mil ke mujh se baat kara kar
Ke tu meri aankhon mein hai poori jachti
Aur tere aage meri nahin ek chalti
Ye duniya wale nikaale na kami 
Main apne upar lelu teri saari galti
Aur mit jaayenge yeh faasle
Ban jaayenge naye kaafile
Hey, hey, hey, hey hey hey...
Hey, hey hey...
Tu aake dekh le, ho maine raatein kitni saari 
Teri yaadon mein guzaari, sohniye sohniye..
Tu aake dekh le, ho maine raatein kitni saari 
Teri yaadon mein guzaari, sohniye sohniye..
Log kehthe mujhko galat, main rakhta teri talab
Par kya karun, teri tasveeron ko dekhke uth'ti tadap
Main rokta khudko nahi, aansu aa jaate hain
Main wo nahin jo kare pyar kisi se bhi naam ka rakh ke farak
Bas mere aage apni hi tu baat kara kar
Dil dukh na jaye mera thoda dhyan rakha kar 
Bas mere aage apni hi tu baat kara kar

Aur mit jaayenge yeh faasle
Ban jaayenge naye kaafile

Hey hey hey..
Tu aake dekh le, ho maine raatein kitni saari
Teri yaadon mein guzaari sohniye sohniye
Tu aake dekh le, ho maine raatein kitni saari
Teri yaadon mein guzaari sohniye sohniye

songs.name: Mere Yaaraa(Sooryavanshi)
songs.lyrics:
...
Tumse dil jabse mila hai
Koi to wajah hai, ishq hua hai
Itni si baat samajh lo
Saare jahan mein tumse hua hai
O, lakhon mile, koi bhi na tumsa mila
O mera ye dil teri oar chalta gaya na ruka
Mere yaaraa, mere yaaraa, maan ja na, mere yaaraa
Aake mujhe thaam le, tu bhi mera naam le
Mere yaaraa, mere yaaraa, maan ja na, mere yaaraa
...
Oh teri-meri baatein hoti rahe, aisi mulaqaatein hoti rahe
Tu jo mere paas rahe, jaadu sa yun chalta rahe

Thoda darte ho na? Pyaar karte ho na?

songs.name: Valam(Made in China (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack))
songs.lyrics:
Mede thi kain laavjo mari haathu vaalida
Pann vehlera tame aavjo mara valalm vhalida

Ho tera piya itna haseen kaise
Mujhse yeh puchhe aaina

Main teri nazar utaarun

Pedon pe baandhe

Par aasmaan mein apne sitaare
Jud hi gaye phir bhi

Main teri nazar utaaru
Tujhe jag se sambhaalu
Koi aanch tujhpe aaye na..

Tujhe jitna main pyaar karun yaara
Kisi aur se na kiya.. kiya...

Ke vehlera tame aavjo...
